text: @SidneyPowell1 @realDonaldTrump @GenFlynn @dbongino @molmccann @BoSnerdley I'm sorry, did you happen to check to see that the US has the record in Coronavirus cases?  Seems like people who abide by the restrictions have countries that control their outbreaks.
